generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by parked cars and sidewalks.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, with pedestrians and parked cars adjacent to them.
- building: Buildings are present on the right side of the road, including one with scaffolding.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along both sides of the road.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the road, near the pedestrian area.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those for traffic signs and lighting.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including directional and regulatory signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the road.
- wall: A wall is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the building.
